birthdate_too_young: You must be at least 16 years old
invalid_password: Password must be 8-20 characters, include uppercase, lowercase, number, special character, and not be common
agreement_required: You must accept the user agreement
agreement_text:
This user agreement governs the use of our website. Please read it carefully before registering.

1. General Provisions

This agreement is a legally binding contract between you and our company. By registering on the website, you agree to comply with all specified terms.

2. Terms of Use

You agree to provide accurate information during registration and not to use the website for illegal purposes.

3. Privacy

We are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy.

4. Responsibility

You are responsible for any actions performed using your account.

5. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify this agreement. Notifications of changes will be posted on the website.

6. Contact Information

For any questions, contact us at: info@h-t-l.ru or by phone at +7 (495) 125-10-07.

7. Final Provisions

This agreement takes effect upon your registration and remains in effect until you cease using the website.

8. Additional Terms

You agree not to distribute malicious software or take actions that may disrupt the website's operation.

9. Restrictions

Access to some website features may be restricted depending on your region or account status.

10. Conclusion

We thank you for choosing our website and look forward to a fruitful cooperation.
